item.description:
Description:Twice a year Unity Games puts on an all day (9am-midnight) open gaming event. For this one over 300 gamers are expected. Hundreds of different games will be available to play (or bring your own if you have a favorite). Lots of this meetup members have been before, and everyone is friendly.

Please visit http://www.unitygames... for more details and the paypal link to pre-register.

Cost: $10.50 if you pre-register (earlier than 1 week before), otherwise $15 at the door (space permitting)

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Unity Games 14
